# y

**Instance Property**

The location of the map point along the map’s y-axis.

## Declaration

```swift
y: number;
```

## Defining a map point

- **x**: The location of the map point along the map’s x-axis.
- **z**: The z component of a map point.
- **w**: The w component of a map point.
